name: Desun
description:
A little game made by Dagon_Dev

Desun is a tower-defense game with rank system

Controls:

WASD: move

Left mouse button: shoot

E: Interact/Open the shop

ESC: Pause the game/Close the shop

Ranks:

Bronze: 0 to 5 waves.

Silver: 5 to 15 waves.

Gold: 15 to 25 waves.

Amethyst: 25 to 40 waves.

Diamond: 40+ waves.

Sounds: https://opengameart.org

Music: http://matthewpablo.com/credits/
